description: 30% Reduced Life, Mana, and Energy Shield Recovery Rate

description: 60% Reduced Life, Mana, and Energy Shield Recovery Rate

name: Lessened Reach
description: Players have 50% less Area of Effect and Projectile Speed

name: Buffs Expire Faster
description: Buffs expire three times faster on players

name: Less Cooldown recovery
description: Cooldowns take five times longer to recharge

name: Escalating Damage Taken
description: For the remainder of the encounter, damage taken will slowly increase by 1% per second, up to 50%

Unknown8: All Monsters gain 2.5% increased attack, cast, and movement speed per second they are alive, up to 50%

description: Monsters deal 30% of Physical Damage Added as Chaos Damage

name: Unlucky Criticals
description: Your Critical Strike Chance is Unlucky

name: Hindering Flasks
description: Using a Flask Hinders you by 50% for 4 seconds

name: Limited Flasks
description: Using a Flask removes any existing Flask effects

name: Ailment and Curse Reflection
description: Curses and Non-damaging Ailments you apply are Reflected

name: Lightning Damage from Mana Costs
description: Take 50% of Mana costs as Lightning Damage

description: Take 200% of Mana costs as Lightning Damage

description: Take 1000% of Mana costs as Lightning Damage

name: Random Projectiles
description:
Your Projectiles fly in random directions
Monsters fire additional Projectiles

name: Treacherous Auras
description: Your Auras that affect Allies also affect Enemies

name: Occasional Impotence
description: You and your Minions deal no damage for 2 seconds every 8 seconds

name: Siphoned Charges
description:
Lose a Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charge every second
Monsters gain Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on hit
